document_data.name: Ugris' Accurate Maps
document_data.mainbody: '''Ugris' Accurate Maps''' was a shop located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located on the [[Throat (road)|Throat]] outside of the [[Throat Gate]] of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]].
document_data.Activities: Maps of the ruins of Zhentil Keep following the city's destruction in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, could be purchased here for 5 [[gp]], though the shop's proprietor did not claim any responsibility for loss of life, limb, or property as a result of following one of his maps.
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by a man named [[Ugris]].
